subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: As the 2008-9 season dawned, the Pittsburgh Penguins seemed poised for greatness. But going into Sunday, the Penguins find themselves chasing the final Eastern Conference playoff spot.
snippet: As the 2008-9 season dawned, the Pittsburgh Penguins seemed poised for greatness. But going into Sunday, the Penguins find themselves chasing the final Eastern Conference playoff spot.
